html: Well guys I made it through the show!! I’ve never sang in falsetto so much in my life but I still had fun!! Thank you Glasgow!!!
text: Well guys I made it through the show!! I’ve never sang in falsetto so much in my life but I still had fun!! Thank you Glasgow!!!

html: I still have to protect my voice so y’all may have to hit the high notes for me tonight
text: I still have to protect my voice so y’all may have to hit the high notes for me tonight

html: I feel sooooo much better, thank you for all your well wishes!!!! You guys are the best!!!
text: I feel sooooo much better, thank you for all your well wishes!!!! You guys are the best!!!

html: This seriously sucks.. haven’t left my hotel room in 2 days now. Sick, bored and bummed out.
text: This seriously sucks.. haven’t left my hotel room in 2 days now. Sick, bored and bummed out.

html: I’m literally gutted that I have to postpone this next show in Birmingham.. I’ve never had to miss shows due to my vocal chords or being sick in my LIFE
text: I’m literally gutted that I have to postpone this next show in Birmingham.. I’ve never had to miss shows due to my vocal chords or being sick in my LIFE

html: My fans are seriously the best... I can’t believe how much love and support I’ve received today.. the video of my fans singing skyscraper outside of the venue made me cry
